title: Introduction to IMAC visual programming application. Tutorial videos. Part IV.
description: In this tutorial video we talk about Array block. Array block allows user to automate sequencing through elements of array as coordinate points. We show how Array block can be used in the applications like pick and place assembly and pipepetting in lab automation.
